data.eml:eml: Adult Trematodes (Platyhelminthes) of freshwater fishes from Argentina: a checklist

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Margarita Ostrowski de Núñez, Nathalia J. Arredondo, Alicia A. Gil de Pertierra (2017): Adult Trematodes (Platyhelminthes) of freshwater fishes from Argentina: a checklist. Revue suisse de Zoologie 124 (1): 91-113, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.1040686
